content: I do not have access to real-time information on the level of gender equality or the status of women's rights in istanbul. however, according to reports, turkey as a whole has made progress towards gender equality in recent years, but there are still significant challenges facing women in terms of discrimination, violence, and limited opportunities in the workforce. the situation in istanbul may be different in some ways from other parts of the country, so it is important to consider the local context when assessing the status of women's rights and gender equality.
